column2:
```r
hcc <-
  hcc %>% 
  mutate(trimester = as.factor(trimester))
contrasts(hcc$trimester) = cbind(c(0,1,0), c(0,0,1)) #first is baseline
hc_trimester1 <- lmer(hc_trimlog ~ trimester + weeks_preg_cent + (trimester|ID), data = hcc)
summary(hc_trimester1)
```
